sentences: Sarah Longfield is an American YouTuber, musician, and multi-instrumentalist based in Madison, Wisconsin.
Longfield started her YouTube channel in 2007.
She gained a boost of followers after collaborating with Rob Scallon on a series of ukulele covers of metal songs.
In 2017, Longfield contributed a track to She Rocks, Vol. 1, a compilation released by the record label Favored Nations.
In 2018, she signed with label Season of Mist and released the album Disparity. She produced the album herself.
